title: High Ping 132 - 135 (Verizon FiOS) (East Coast)
body:
My friends and I have been playing league recently and have been having issues with my ping. Weather im in Ranked, ARAM or normal games, my ping is always 132 - 135 throughout the entire game. 
Just posting to see if anyone else is having this issue.
Any way to resolve this would be greatly needed. 
Thanks.

replies.body: We're still noticing a lot of these Verizon issues today, unfortunately. Looking at the Verizon outage map, they're showing a widespread area on the east coast that's being affected. Until their issues and outages clear up, I'd suggest staying away from normal/ranked matches!
